casebody.data:
Avi STERN, Appellant,
v.
Michael KORETSKY, Roseanne Koretsky, Allen M. Silk, as Trustee of the Jamie Koretsky Irrevocable Trust, and Allen M. DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
